languages.text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.
languages.original_text: В Просторе Коронус есть всего несколько молодых Имперских колоний, его природные ресурсы практически непочаты, а варп-пространство коварно и неизведанно. Пока Вольные Торговцы соревнуются друг с другом за тайные и явные ресурсы в попытках обосновать свои протектораты, пираты, ксеносы и слуги Темных богов терроризируют Простор, желая обречь человечество на ужас и погибель.

traits.locale_text: A scattered collection of a few young Imperial colonies, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their trade empires, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humankind.

A scattered collection of a few young Imperial colonies, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their trade empires, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humankind.

A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

languages.text: В Просторе Коронус есть всего несколько молодых Имперских колоний, его природные ресурсы практически непочаты, а варп-пространство коварно и неизведанно. Пока Вольные Торговцы соревнуются друг с другом за тайные и явные ресурсы в попытках обосновать свои протектораты, пираты, ксеносы и слуги Темных богов терроризируют Простор, желая обречь человечество на ужас и погибель.

Die Koronus-Ausdehnung, eine verstreute Ansammlung einiger junger imperialer Kolonien, verfügt über ein kaum erschlossenes natürliches Vermögen, und der Warpraum ist tückisch und unerforscht. Während Freihändler untereinander um bekannte und verborgene Ressourcen konkurrieren, um ihre Protektorate aufzubauen, terrorisieren Piraten, Xenos und Diener der Dunklen Götter die Ausdehnung, um die Menschheit in Angst und Schrecken zu versetzen.
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung, eine verstreute Ansammlung einiger junger imperialer Kolonien, verfügt über ein kaum erschlossenes natürliches Vermögen, und der Warpraum ist tückisch und unerforscht. Während Freihändler untereinander um bekannte und verborgene Ressourcen konkurrieren, um ihre Protektorate aufzubauen; Piraten, Xenos und Diener der Dunklen Götter terrorisieren die Ausdehnung, um die Menschheit in Angst und Schrecken zu versetzen.

languages.text: Ensemble épars de jeunes colonies impériales, les Étendues de Koronus possèdent des richesses naturelles pratiquement inexploitées, et son espace Warp est traître et inexploré. Alors que les libres-marchands se disputent les ressources connues et cachées tout en s'efforçant de bâtir leurs protectorats, les pirates, les xénos et les serviteurs des Dieux Sombres terrorisent les Étendues, désireux de semer la peur et le chaos au sein de l'Humanité.
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Ensemble dispersé de plusieurs jeunes colonies impériales, les Étendues de Koronus possèdent des richesses naturelles pratiquement inexploitées, et son espace warp est traître et inexploré. Alors que les Libres-Marchands se disputent les ressources connues et cachées en s'efforçant de construire leurs protectorats, les pirates, les xénos et les serviteurs des Dieux Sombres terrorisent les Étendues, soucieux désireux de semer la peur et le chaos au sein de l'Humanité.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区散落着许多历史较短的帝国殖民地，拥有大量几乎尚未开发的自然资源，但亚空间中也充满了秘密与危险。在这里，许多行商浪人为了争夺已知与未知的资源而互相斗争，在这片星区中建立了属于自己的王朝。无数海盗、异形与黑暗诸神的仆人都在威胁着科罗努斯扩区的安全，渴望散播恐惧与破坏。
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区散落着许多历史较短的帝国殖民地，拥有大量几乎尚未开发的自然资源，但亚空间中也充满了秘密与危险。在这里，许多行商浪人为了争夺已知与未知的资源而互相斗争，在这片星区中建立了属于自己的王朝。无数海盗、异形与黑暗诸神的仆人都在威胁着科罗努斯扩区的安全，渴望散播恐惧与破坏。

languages.text: 数少ない帝国のできたばかりのコロニーが散在するコロヌス・エクスパンスには、ほとんど手つかずの自然資源があり、そのワープスペースは危険な未踏の地である。自由開拓者たちが保護国家の建設にまい進しながら、既知と未知の資源をめぐって互いにしのぎを削る一方、海賊、異種族、暗黒神の従者たちは、人類に恐怖と破壊を与えようと、エクスパンスを恐怖のどん底に陥れている。
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 数少ない帝国のできたばかりのコロニーが散在するコロヌス・エクスパンスには、ほとんど手つかずの自然資源があり、そのワープスペースは危険な未踏の地である。自由開拓者たちが保護国家の建設にまい進しながら、既知と未知の資源をめぐって互いにしのぎを削る一方、海賊、異種族、暗黒神の従者たちは、人類に恐怖と破壊を与えようと、エクスパンスを恐怖のどん底に陥れている。

languages.text: La Extensión de Koronus, conjunto diseminado de colonias recientes del Imperium, posee una riqueza natural prácticamente virgen y su espacio disforme es traicionero e indómito. Mientras los Comerciantes Independientes compiten entre sí por los recursos conocidos y ocultos para construir sus protectorados, los piratas, los xenos y los siervos de los Dioses Oscuros aterrorizan la Extensión, deseosos de traer el miedo y la destrucción a la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión de Koronus, conjunto diseminado de colonias recientes del Imperium, posee una riqueza natural prácticamente virgen y su espacio disforme es traicionero e indómito. Mientras los Comerciantes Independientes compiten entre sí por los recursos conocidos y ocultos para construir sus protectorados, los piratas, los xenos y los siervos de los Dioses Oscuros aterrorizan la Extensión, deseosos de traer el miedo y la destrucción a la Humanidad.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un birkaç genç kolonisinden oluşan dağınık bir bölge olan Koronus Enginliği, hemen hemen hiç dokunulmamış doğal zenginliklere sahiptir. Öteuzayı, tehlikeli ve keşfedilmemiştir. Hür Tacirler kendi protektoralarını inşa etmek uğruna hem bilinen hem de saklı kaynaklar için birbiriyle yarışırken korsanlar, zenolar ve Kara Tanrıların hizmetkârları İnsanlığa korku ve yıkımı musallat etmek için Enginlik'te terör estirir.
languages.original_text: A scattered collection of a few young colonies of the Imperium, the Koronus Expanse possesses virtually untapped natural wealth, and its warpspace is treacherous and unexplored. While Rogue Traders vie with one another for both known and hidden resources as they strive to build their protectorates, pirates, xenos, and servants of the Dark Gods terrorise the Expanse, eager to cast fear and destruction upon Humanity.
